title: How energy independent is Europe?
subtitle: As of 2024 the EU27 countries reach a score of 4.0 out of 10.0 in terms of energy independence.
textNote: The energy independence score is calculated as 75% of the score for imported fossil fuels plus 25% of the score for imported electricity, adjusted by the change in electricity imports from 2021 to 2023. A higher score indicates greater energy independence.
